(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB really))
    (VP (VBD hit)
      (NP (DT the) (NNP Durian) (NN jackpot))
      (NP (JJ last) (NN week))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB when))
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBD responded)
            (PP (TO to)
              (NP (DT an) (JJ urgent) (NN call)))
            (PP (IN from)
              (NP
                (NP (PRP$ my) (NN Durianologist))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WP who))
                  (S
                    (ADVP (RB excitedly))
                    (VP (VBD told)
                      (NP (PRP me))
                      (SBAR (IN that)
                        (S
                          (NP (PRP he))
                          (VP (VBD was)
                            (PP (IN in)
                              (S
                                (VP (VBG Sembawang)
                                  (S
                                    (VP (TO to)
                                      (VP (VB check)
                                        (PRT (RP out))
                                        (NP
                                          (NP (DT some) (NNP Lao) (NNP Tai) (NNP Po))
                                          (SBAR
                                            (S (-LRB- -LRB-)
                                              (NP (NNP Grand) (JJ old) (NN lady))
                                              (-RRB- -RRB-)
                                              (VP (VBZ Durians)))))))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(hit-3, I-1)
advmod(hit-3, really-2)
root(ROOT-0, hit-3)
det(jackpot-6, the-4)
nn(jackpot-6, Durian-5)
dobj(hit-3, jackpot-6)
amod(week-8, last-7)
tmod(hit-3, week-8)
advmod(responded-11, when-9)
nsubj(responded-11, I-10)
advcl(hit-3, responded-11)
prep(responded-11, to-12)
det(call-15, an-13)
amod(call-15, urgent-14)
pobj(to-12, call-15)
prep(responded-11, from-16)
poss(Durianologist-18, my-17)
pobj(from-16, Durianologist-18)
nsubj(told-21, who-19)
advmod(told-21, excitedly-20)
rcmod(Durianologist-18, told-21)
dobj(told-21, me-22)
mark(was-25, that-23)
nsubj(was-25, he-24)
ccomp(told-21, was-25)
prep(was-25, in-26)
pcomp(in-26, Sembawang-27)
aux(check-29, to-28)
xcomp(Sembawang-27, check-29)
prt(check-29, out-30)

            (NP (NNP Yong) (NNP Peng))))))

        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP are)
            (VP (VBG wondering)))
          (, ,))))))
